TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ScriptResourceAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class ScriptResourceAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ScriptResourceAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 在組件中定義要從用戶端指令碼檔案使用的資源。

span.span: Defines a resource in an assembly to be used from a client script file.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別無效，只有當您使用它的組件宣告中。The class is valid only when you use it in assembly declarations. 您可以使用它來啟用指定的內嵌指令碼資源的組件中。You use it to enable a specified embedded script resource in an assembly. 您可以定義內嵌指令碼程式庫名稱、 指令碼程式庫、 資源檔的名稱和用來擷取資源值的指令碼檔案中的名稱。You can define the name of the embedded script library, the name of the resource file for the script library, and the name that is used in a script file for retrieving the resource values. 類別會使用中的屬性來判斷指令碼程式庫的正確資源名稱。The class uses the properties in to determine the correct resource name for a script library. 屬性用於指定資源的資源索引鍵。The property is used with a resource key to specify a resource. > [!NOTE] > 類別可用於只識別 JavaScript 檔案以文字為基礎的資源。The class can be used only to identify text-based resources for JavaScript files. 若要將關聯的特定文化特性當地語系化的映像 （二進位） 檔案，請考慮將它的 URL 儲存為當地語系化的資源，然後是 已解決和載入的指令碼。To associate a localized image (binary) file with a particular culture, consider storing only its URL as a localized resource, which then be resolved and loaded in script. ## Examples 下列範例所示名為 CheckAnswer.js 從 VerificationResources 資源檔中使用資源的指令碼檔案的屬性。The following example shows a attribute for a script file named CheckAnswer.js that uses resources from the VerificationResources resource files. 名稱`Answer`用來參考這些資源。The name `Answer` is used to reference these resources. [!code-csharp[LocalizingClientResourcesWalkthrough#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/LocalizingClientResourcesWalkthrough/cs/AssemblyInfo.cs#3)] [!code-vb[LocalizingClientResourcesWalkthrough#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/LocalizingClientResourcesWalkthrough/vb/AssemblyInfo.vb#3)] 下列範例示範如何使用用戶端指令碼中的資源。The following example shows how to use the resources in client script. 資源索引鍵 (`Correct`並`Incorrect`) 前面會加上`Answer`來識別包含值的指令碼資源定義。The resource keys (`Correct` and `Incorrect`) are prefixed with `Answer` to identify the script resource definition that contains the values. [!code-javascript[LocalizingClientResourcesWalkthrough#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/LocalizingClientResourcesWalkthrough/cs/CheckAnswer.js#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常會使用呼叫方法做為應用程式的 AssemblyInfo 檔案中的組件屬性的屬性。The method is typically called by using the attribute as an assembly attribute in the application's AssemblyInfo file.

summary.span: 取得指令碼程式庫的名稱。

span.span: Gets the name of the script library.
The name of the script library.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例所示名為 CheckAnswer.js 從 VerificationResources 資源檔中使用資源的指令碼檔案的屬性。The following example shows a attribute for a script file named CheckAnswer.js that uses resources from the VerificationResources resource files. 名稱`Answer`用來參考這些資源。The name `Answer` is used to reference these resources. 在此範例中，屬性會傳回"LocalizingResources.CheckAnswer.js 」。In this example, the property returns "LocalizingResources.CheckAnswer.js". [!code-csharp[LocalizingClientResourcesWalkthrough#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/LocalizingClientResourcesWalkthrough/cs/AssemblyInfo.cs#3)] [!code-vb[LocalizingClientResourcesWalkthrough#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/LocalizingClientResourcesWalkthrough/vb/AssemblyInfo.vb#3)] 下列範例示範如何使用用戶端指令碼中的資源。The following example shows how to use the resources in client script. 資源索引鍵 (`Correct`並`Incorrect`) 前面會加上`Answer`來識別包含值的指令碼資源定義。The resource keys (`Correct` and `Incorrect`) are prefixed with `Answer` to identify the script resource definition that contains the values. [!code-javascript[LocalizingClientResourcesWalkthrough#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/LocalizingClientResourcesWalkthrough/cs/CheckAnswer.js#1)]

summary.span: 取得擷取資源檔中之值時使用的名稱。

span.span: Gets the name that is used when retrieving the values in the resource file.

value.span: 擷取資源檔中的值時，在用戶端指令碼中使用的名稱。

span.span: The name that is used in client script when retrieving the values in the resource file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含用來擷取當地語系化的資源，用戶端指令碼中的值。The property contains the value that is used for retrieving localized resources in client script. 用戶端指令碼必須包含值和當地語系化資源的索引鍵名稱。The client script must include the value and the key name for the resource to be localized. ## Examples 下列範例所示名為 CheckAnswer.js 從 VerificationResources 資源檔中使用資源的指令碼檔案的屬性。The following example shows a attribute for a script file named CheckAnswer.js that uses resources from the VerificationResources resource files. 名稱`Answer`用來參考這些資源。The name `Answer` is used to reference these resources. 在此範例中，屬性會傳回 「 解答 」。In this example, the property returns "Answer". [!code-csharp[LocalizingClientResourcesWalkthrough#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/LocalizingClientResourcesWalkthrough/cs/AssemblyInfo.cs#3)] [!code-vb[LocalizingClientResourcesWalkthrough#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/LocalizingClientResourcesWalkthrough/vb/AssemblyInfo.vb#3)] 下列範例示範如何使用用戶端指令碼中的資源。The following example shows how to use the resources in client script. 資源索引鍵 (`Correct`並`Incorrect`) 前面會加上`Answer`來識別包含值的指令碼資源定義。The resource keys (`Correct` and `Incorrect`) are prefixed with `Answer` to identify the script resource definition that contains the values. [!code-javascript[LocalizingClientResourcesWalkthrough#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/LocalizingClientResourcesWalkthrough/cs/CheckAnswer.js#1)]
